studyName: Longitudinal Studies of Brain Structure and Function in MPS Disorders

rules.rationale: ldn_14090_mri (37 vars) contains brain MRI volumetric measures: VolumeAmygdalaLeft/Right/Total, VolumeHippocampusBodyLeft/Right/HeadLeft/Right, plus FractionalAnisotrophy and MeanDiffusivity (DTI-derived), and qualitative ratings (Atrophy, BasalGanglia, CorpusCallosum). All from one MRI session. Regex anchored to '$' to match only table names ending in 'mri'.
rules.description: 'Brain Volumes: Manual Tracing and Free Surfer Volumes.'
